product_name: Big Agnes Super Scout UL2 Tent
long_description: Sporting an enormous vestibule, the 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Super Scout UL2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry about a pound per person for this waterproof shelter. Super Scout features 1 large, easy-entry front door and 44 sq. ft. vestibule. Set up the tent with 1 included pole on the inside at the foot end, 1 trekking pole on the outside at the door and 1 trekking pole in the vestibule. Single wall design has front and rear vents to keep air circulating inside the tent; vents are lined with polyester mesh to keep the bugs out. Reflective guylines and webbing at tent corners enhance nighttime visibility. Silicone-treated ripstop nylon with waterproof polyurethane coating is durable and lightweight. Waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs) seals all seams; waterproof door help keep tent dry. Big Agnes Super Scout UL2 tent features 2 built-in, bin-shaped storage shelves and gear loft loops (gear loft sold separately). Includes stuff sacks and 13 superlight aluminum J stakes.
short_description: Sporting an enormous vestibule, the 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Super Scout UL2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry about a pound per person for this waterproof shelter.
